etymology.description: 巴 (from Bakunin 巴枯宁) + 金 (from Kropotkin 克鲁泡特金) = pen name honoring two anarchist thinkers.
etymology.interpretation: A pen name blending the Chinese transcriptions of Bakunin and Kropotkin, reflecting admiration for their ideas. Conveys revolutionary and idealistic leanings.

parts.english: to cling; to long for; to hope for; Sichuan (abbr.)

examples.chinese: 我喜欢读巴金的小说(我喜歡讀巴金的小說)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuān dú Bā Jīn de xiǎoshuō.
examples.english: I like reading Ba Jin’s novels.

examples.chinese: 巴金是二十世纪著名的中国作家(巴金是二十世紀著名的中國作家)。
examples.pinyin: Bā Jīn shì èrshí shìjì zhùmíng de Zhōngguó zuòjiā.
examples.english: Ba Jin is a famous 20th-century Chinese writer.

examples.chinese: 他的真名是李尧棠(他的真名是李堯棠)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de zhēnmíng shì Lǐ Yáotáng.
examples.english: His real name is Li Yaotang.
